# POST /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  POST /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments 

Web Service Endpoint# POST /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments
```

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments#http-body)

`[AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentcreaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments#response-codes)

` 201 Created``[AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentresponse)`Created`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 409 Conflict``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Conflict`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 422 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments#Endpoints)

[`List All Treatments for an App Store Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appstoreversionexperiments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)Get a list of all treatments for a specific App Store version experiment.[`GET /v2/appStoreVersionExperiments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v2-appstoreversionexperiments-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatments/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_-relationships-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations)[`Modify an App Store version experiement treatment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Update the name and app icon name for a specific App Store version experiment.[`Delete a Treatment for an App Store Version Experiment`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatments-_id_)Delete metadata that you configured for an App Store Version experiment.
